experience.title: Associate Research Manager
experience.description: My job role enabled me to work with global clients and providing them with data-based solutions. My job role also included Consumer research/ channel & retail research, specifically product testing, U&A, pricing projects, especially in FMCG/ Consumer durables, Quantitative research techniques & tools like questionnaire / research design / preparing a research execution plan etc.

experience.title: Marketing Intern
experience.description: Marketing and social media content creation for the organisation, highlighting their work towards providing education to the underprivileged.
experience.description_html: Marketing and social media content creation for the organisation, highlighting their work towards providing education to the underprivileged. <!---->

experience.title: Business Development Intern
experience.description: The internship not just got me adapted to the online normalcy but also the right approach to:Business Development structure and designThe power of Digital and Social MediaThe tools and techniques for Selling on Phone As a next step, to this, I also successfully delivered the assigned tasks and worked in groups through the medium of Teamwork, Problem Solving, Ideating, Digital Creativity, Communication Skills, Adaptability, Ownership, Time Management, and Influencing stakeholders.  I was selected as the CEO of my team and it really helped me understand the responsibility and synergy in a team, yet again. I was really fortunate to meet some of the most talented minds of the county and abroad.
experience.description_html: The internship not just got me adapted to the online normalcy but also the right approach to:Business Development structure and designThe power of Digital and Social MediaThe tools and techniques for Selling on Phone As a next step, to this, I also successfully delivered the assigned tasks and worked in groups through the medium of Teamwork, Problem Solving, Ideating, Digital Creativity, Communication Skills, Adaptability, Ownership, Time Management, and Influencing stakeholders. I was selected as the CEO of my team and it really helped me understand the responsibility and synergy in a team, yet again. I was really fortunate to meet some of the most talented minds of the county and abroad.

experience.title: Co-Founder
experience.description: X-Plain is the name of an idea which means not only an organisation but a source for mutual growth, knowledge sharing and a step towards a better future.
